generated.css: :root{--grid-space:20px;--left-nav-width:160px;--top-box-height:180px}body{color:#4d4d4d;font-family:Open Sans,sans-serif;font-weight:300;margin:0;max-width:100%;padding:0;width:100vw}body,main{position:relative}main{background:#f7f7f7;margin-left:var(--left-nav-width);width:calc(100vw - var(--left-nav-width))}main,nav{min-height:100vh}nav{background:#222a47;color:#919191;float:left;font-size:14px;height:100vh;left:0;position:fixed;top:0;width:var(--left-nav-width);z-index:40}nav #timeNav{color:#e9e9e9;margin:1vw auto 0;text-align:center}nav #economicsNav,nav #employeesNav,nav #overviewNav,nav #profile{cursor:pointer;margin:60px auto 0;text-align:center}nav .nav-menu:hover .cls-1,nav .nav-menu:hover circle,nav .nav-menu:hover path,nav .nav-menu:hover rect{fill:#e9e9e9;transition:fill .3s}nav .active .cls-1,nav .active circle,nav .active path,nav .active rect{fill:#e9e9e9}nav .active p{color:#e9e9e9}nav .nav-icon{height:40px;margin:0 auto;stroke:#e9e9e9}nav #bottom-nav{bottom:0;height:160px;left:0;position:absolute;width:160px}nav #bottom-nav p{font-size:12px}nav #profile{margin-top:20px;text-align:center;width:35%}nav #profile p{color:#e9e9e9}nav #profilePic{display:block;margin:0 auto;width:100%}nav #settings{float:left;margin-left:10px;margin-top:40px;text-align:center}nav #settings img{display:block;height:20px;margin:0 auto;width:20px}nav #logout p{color:#919191;float:right;margin-right:10px;margin-top:45px}#overview{display:grid;grid-gap:var(--grid-space);grid-template-columns:repeat(6,1fr);margin:0 auto;min-height:300px;overflow-x:hidden;padding-top:20px;width:calc(100vw - var(--left-nav-width) - var(--grid-space) - var(--grid-space))}.boxes{background:#fff;border-radius:15px;grid-column:span 3;width:100%}.box-header{font-size:22px;margin-top:20px}#top-box{grid-column:span 6;height:var(--top-box-height)}#top-box .box-header{font-size:22px;margin-top:30px}#top-box #top-box-wrapper{display:grid;grid-gap:var(--grid-space);grid-template-columns:repeat(6,1fr);margin:0 auto;width:calc(100vw - var(--left-nav-width) - var(--grid-space) - var(--grid-space))}#top-box #top-box-wrapper>div{grid-column:span 2;height:var(--top-box-height);text-align:center}#top-box .queue p,#top-box .serving p{display:inline-block;font-size:60px;margin-top:10px}#top-box img{left:130px;margin:0 auto;position:absolute;right:0;top:24px;width:30px}#top-box .serving img{top:22px;width:25px}#top-box .performance,#top-box .queue,#top-box .serving{height:100%;height:var(--top-box-height);position:relative}#top-box .performance #perf-chart{height:calc(var(--top-box-height) - 20px)!important;margin:-35px auto 0;width:calc(var(--top-box-height) - 20px)!important;z-index:30}#top-box .performance .perf-value{bottom:30px;font-size:18px;left:0;margin:0 auto;position:absolute;right:0}#keg-level{height:calc(100vh - var(--grid-space) - var(--grid-space) - var(--grid-space) - var(--top-box-height));position:relative}#keg-level #keg-level-chart{height:calc(100vh - var(--grid-space) - var(--grid-space) - var(--grid-space) - var(--top-box-height) - 20%)!important;margin:20px auto 0;width:85%!important}#keg-level h2{margin-left:10px}#storage{height:calc(100vh - var(--grid-space) - var(--grid-space) - var(--grid-space) - var(--top-box-height));position:relative}#storage #storage-level-chart{height:calc(100vh - var(--grid-space) - var(--grid-space) - var(--grid-space) - var(--top-box-height) - 20%)!important;margin:20px auto 0;width:85%!important}#storage h2{margin-left:10px}.display-modal-button{border:1.5px solid grey;border-radius:50%;bottom:0;color:grey;cursor:pointer;font-family:serif;height:20px;line-height:20px;margin:10px;position:absolute;right:0;text-align:center;width:20px}#modal{background:rgba(0,0,0,.76);height:100vh;position:fixed;right:0;top:-100vh;transition:top .7s;width:calc(100vw - var(--left-nav-width))}#modal-info{background:#fff;border-radius:5px;height:60vh;margin:20vh auto 0;padding:20px;position:relative;width:80vmin}#modal h2{font-weight:700}#modal p{line-height:25px;margin-top:10px;max-height:50vh;overflow-y:auto}#modal button{background:#949494;border:0;border-radius:5px;bottom:40px;color:#fff;cursor:pointer;height:25px;left:0;margin:0 auto;position:absolute;right:0;width:80px}#employee-grid{display:grid;grid-gap:var(--grid-space);grid-template-columns:repeat(6,1fr);margin:0 auto;min-height:210px;overflow-x:hidden;padding-top:20px;width:calc(100vw - var(--left-nav-width) - var(--grid-space) - var(--grid-space))}#employee h2{padding:30px 0 0 20px}#employee-grid .boxes{background:#fff;border-radius:15px;grid-column:span 2;text-align:center;width:100%}#employee-grid .boxes p{padding:5px}#employee img{width:10vw}#economics h2{padding:20px 10px}#economics .description{margin:40vh auto 0;width:60vw}#burger-menu{display:none;height:30px;left:10px;position:fixed;top:5px;width:30px;z-index:50}#burger-menu span{background:#4d4d4d;border-radius:5px;display:block;height:5px;margin-top:5px;width:30px}@media (max-width:992px){.boxes{grid-column:span 6}main{margin-left:0;max-width:100%;width:100vw}#overview{min-height:300px;overflow-x:hidden;padding-top:20px}#overview,#top-box #top-box-wrapper{display:grid;grid-gap:var(--grid-space);grid-template-columns:repeat(6,1fr);margin:0 auto;width:95vw}#top-box #top-box-wrapper>div{grid-column:span 6;text-align:center}#top-box{grid-column:span 6;height:auto}#modal{width:100vw}#burger-menu{display:block}nav{top:-100vh;transition:top .7s}#economics h2{padding:10px 0 0 50px}#employee-grid{grid-template-columns:repeat(1,1fr);width:100vw}#employee-grid img{width:45%}#employee-grid .boxes{margin:0 auto;width:80%}}
